5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu ‘Inabah Al-Khawlani that the Prophet (ﷺ) used to recite “Glorify the Name of your Lord the Most High” and “Has there come to you the narration of the overwhelming (i.e., the Day of Resurrection)? [Al-A’la (87) and Al-Ghashiyah (88)] on Friday

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the recitation in the Prayer on Friday
